use.flag: Pull in the /boot firmware, configs and bootloader.
Pull in the binary kernel package.
Pull in repo signature checker, for isshoni.org rsync.
Pull in cron.weekly script, to run genup automatically.
Pull in essential system packages for image (RPi initscripts etc.).
Pull in main packages for image (clang etc.). Requires innercore.
Pull in packages for baseline Xfce4 system. Requires core.
Pull in Pi-Top support packages (NB most users will NOT want this). Requires xfce.
Pull in baseline desktop apps (libreoffice etc.). Requires xfce.

pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a metapackage. Merge it to pull in the baseline set of packages for the corresponding gentoo-on-rpi-64bit image release, customized by USE-flag for your specific configuration.
